astrolyze Documentation¶

Astrolyze is a python-package with several functions for reduction and analysis of (mainly) radioastronomical data. It is developed over the course of my Diploma and PhD thesis and beyond. I share this package here because I think that they may be useful to other astronomers. The package is open for collaboration.

Please read the Motivation - What is this package about section if you are new to the package.
